message:
Dear valuable customers
We are Tien Dat Co.,Ltd  from Vietnam, a country home with  famous handicraft products which come from traditional handiwork villages. 
Vietnamese traditional handicraft products made by artisans are broadly appreciated by international friends on art, culture aspectsâ€¦. 
Wishing to promote the Vietnamese traditional handy craft products nationwide as well as international friends, we meet all the requirements of our customers whether it is retail or wholesale order with excellent quality and competitive price.
As a bridge between traditional craft villages and consumers, we hope that traditional handy products of Vietnam would be recognized by many friends in the country as well international. We believe that you will trust in our skillful handcrafts. 
Along with providing traditional handcraft products, we are glad to meet your various needs as well as creating more jobs for artisans.
Let contact us to satisfy your need!
Craftsvina Team
Website: www.crraftsvina.com | www.handygoods.com.vn
